categories: Pocket knives and fixed blade knives
description: Make your Leatherman® even more useful and versatile with this accessory kit. The driver slides over the Phillips screwdriver blade and holds the handy bit of your choice. Includes:Driver.Hex 4 and 5mm.Hex 6mm and 1/4in.Torx #10 and #15.Phillips #0 and #3.Flat-head screwdrivers 0.075 and 0.200in.
name: Leatherman Removable Bit Driver
